events_upcoming_intro: Hackers, healers, farmers, foundersâ€”our gatherings mix them all. Come meet your future collaborators.
resources_subheading: From build logs to legal docs, this is our tool shed. Pop in oftenâ€”new seeds sprout weekly.
volunteers_page_intro_text: Get your hands in the soil and your ideas in the mix. Pick a volunteer track that sparks joy.
volunteers_page_more_info: For more information check out our Pink Paper, Visitors Guide. We are excited to have you visit us soon!
resources_resources_heading: Put the kettle on and get to know us a little better
resources_resources_subheading: Read all about our dream: the mission, vision and how we got here, with our digital papers
resources_faq_subheading: Got a question? We're an open source.
stay_meta_description: Experience regenerative living at TDF, a place for collaboration and innovation.
stay_description: Come and stay in our regenerative village under development. Get a chance to learn about permaculture, bio-construction, web3 - or just come and relax surrounded by beautiful nature. We don't have 5 star facilities just yet, but you get to experience the magic of this place during its early years, and we guarantee you'll meet some inspiring humans you'll become friends with.
stay_meet_your_hosts_description: Come and stay in our regenerative village under development. Get a chance to learn about permaculture, bio-construction, web3 - or just come and relax surrounded by beautiful nature. We don't have 5 star facilities just yet, but you get to experience the magic of this place during its early years, and we guarantee you'll meet some inspiring humans you'll become friends with.
stay_chose_accommodation_description: From bringing your own van to staying in a shared dorm, we have a range of options to fit your needs. We recommend staying for 1 month to get the full experience of our community, but you can also come just for an event.
signup_form_get_credits: Get ðŸ¥• 2 carrots for signing up.
carrots_what_1: Trade carrots for lower stay costs.
carrots_what_4: Use 'em within a yearâ€”these carrots do expire!
carrots_how_to_use_1: At checkout, apply your carrot stash if it fully covers lodging.
carrots_how_to_use_4: 10 carrots â†’ 14 nights â†’ not enough
referrals_description_text_1: Share your unique linkâ€”win-win rewards for both of you.
referrals_description_text_2: You earn ðŸ¥• 1, they earn ðŸ¥• 2.
referrals_description_text_3: Max ðŸ¥• 6 per month; resets on the 1st.
cookie_consent_text: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
home_meta_description: Traditional Dream Factoryâ€”Portugal's playground for regenerative living.
home_hero_title: Real Estate Owned by Nature and Governed by Residents.
home_hero_subtitle: Land held in trust for people and planet. Access through tokens. Restoring ecosystems by design.
home_hero_footnote: *Based on independent market appraisal and fixed purchase option.
home_about_subtitle: Five hectares, cowork, glamping, pizza nights, sunset sauna. Suites, restaurant, and mushroom lab on the way.
home_land_development_body: 4 000+ trees are already rooting the soil, with 10 000 more fruit and nut treesâ€”almonds, olives, citrus, berriesâ€”on the blueprint. Contour swales capture rain, feeding our existing and planned lakes and keeping the land lush yearâ€‘round. Our strictly organic methods rely on compost and natural pest control, turning excess biomass into biochar that locks away carbon while boosting fertilityâ€”so every harvest nourishes both the ecovillage and the planet.
home_land_plan_alt: Traditional Dream Factory land plan showing regenerative zones
home_land_food_desc: Our syntropic agroforestry systems integrate 65+ tree species with vegetables and cover crops. We're building a food forest that feeds the community while regenerating the land.
home_land_ecology_desc: With 50% of our land as wild habitat, 40+ bird species, and carbon-validated reforestation, we're proving that human communities can enhance rather than diminish ecosystems.
home_about_sauna: Sauna, Agua Hara pool & outdoor cinema
home_coliving_building_14_suites_desc: 20 mÂ² suites with desk, bath, queen bedâ€”tailored for nomads, families, yogis, and conscious creators.
home_coliving_bioclimatic_buildings_desc: Passive solar, natural airflow, solar roofâ€”comfortable year-round and energy positive.
home_coliving_mixed_use_desc: Events three months a year; a thriving co-living village the other nine.
home_agroforestry_desc: We're planting 10 000 fruit trees, building lakes, and restoring soil with biochar.
home_agroforestry_water_retention_desc: Contour swales and two lakes keep the land lush year-round.
home_agroforestry_restorative_farming_de: No syntheticsâ€”just compost, cover crops, and beneficial bugs.
home_agroforestry_biochar_desc: Excess biomass becomes biocharâ€”locking carbon and feeding trees.
home_agroforestry_scalability: A blueprint villages worldwide can copy.
home_meet_your_tribe: Meet your tribe of solarpunks, nomads, and soil lovers.
home_token_hero_subtitle: $TDF is your access keyâ€”stay credits, votes, and perks.
home_how_to_play_title: How to visit or dive in
home_how_to_play_desc_1: Drop in for a week, volunteer for a month, or craft a residency.
home_how_to_play_desc_2: Residents can level-up to full village Citizenship.
home_how_to_play_volunteer_desc: Learn permaculture, bioconstruction, and community cooking.
home_how_to_play_resident_desc: Stay 1+ month, lead a project, and leave your mark.
home_movement_title: More than a co-livingâ€”join a land-regen movement
home_movement_desc_1: We're the first village in the OASA networkâ€”transforming ownership into stewardship.
home_movement_desc_2: set forth by OASA. By accessing TDF lands, our visitors must abide by our regenerative ethos. OASA is on a bold mission to conserve 100.000 ha of land globally - and TDF is its first prototype in utilising real estate as a vehicle for ecological restoration.
home_token_access_title: Invest in Europe's First DAO-Governed Regenerative Village
home_token_access_tagline: The $TDF token is a unique funding mechanism that enables sustainable growth.
home_token_access_desc: Token sales provide a strong balance sheet while maintaining our ecological ethosâ€”enabling us to build faster and more sustainably than conventional funding models.
home_token_bullet_1: Unique funding stream. Token sales create a diversified capital base that traditional ecovillages cannot access.
home_token_bullet_2: Strong financial foundation. Our token model enables us to maintain financial stability while pursuing regenerative goals.
home_token_bullet_3: Investment with impact. Token holders gain access rights, governance participation, and support a proven regenerative model.
home_investment_construction_note: Construction underway. Core infrastructure built. Final phase completing end of 2026.
home_derisked_property_desc: Traditional Dream Factory operates under a long-term lease with an exclusive option to acquire the underlying property for â‚¬200,000, exercisable until July 2029.
home_derisked_capital_desc: 100% of proceeds from $TDF token sales are reinvested into the operating company as equity. No dividend extraction or revenue skimming mechanisms exist.
home_derisked_liquidity_desc: As of October 2025, the company holds â‚¬191k in cash and reports no undisclosed liabilities, litigation, or off-balance-sheet guarantees.
home_investment_unique_funding: Unlike other ecovillages that rely solely on donations or loans, our token model provides a sustainable funding mechanism that aligns investor interests with our ecological mission. This unique approach enables us to build a stronger balance sheet while maintaining our commitment to regenerative practices.
home_invest_cohousing_desc: Long-term residential participation in a 23-unit co-housing development, governed collectively and integrated with shared land stewardship.
home_invest_tokens_desc: A non-extractive funding instrument providing access rights, governance participation, and long-term alignment with the project's development.
home_invest_lending_desc: Fixed-term private loans with defined interest, collateralised against real assets held by the operating company.
home_annual_report_intro: Our annual reports demonstrate years of operational experience, financial transparency, and measurable progress. Review our complete journey from initial concept to current development phase.
home_vision_description: Traditional Dream Factory is a regenerative village in Portugal's Alentejo region, where land stewardship, flexible living models, and community come together. We're building a place where people can live, work, and thrive while regenerating the land.
home_land_stewardship_desc: Our approach to land management focuses on long-term ecological health and biodiversity. We're creating a model that can be replicated across Portugal and beyond.
home_land_stewardship_bullet_1: 10,000+ fruit and nut trees planned, with 4,000+ already planted
home_land_stewardship_bullet_2: Water retention systems including lakes and contour swales
home_flexible_use_desc: The village operates on a flexible model that adapts to different needs throughout the yearâ€”from co-living to events to private residences.
home_flexible_use_bullet_1: Co-living suites for short and long-term stays
home_flexible_use_bullet_2: Event space for gatherings and workshops
home_coliving_intro: Our co-living development includes 14 en-suite rooms designed for modern nomads, families, and conscious creators. The buildings are bioclimatic, energy-positive, and designed for year-round comfort.
home_governance_description: Traditional Dream Factory has operated continuously since 2021, publishing annual reports and maintaining transparent governance structures. Decision-making rights are tied to participation and stewardship rather than speculative ownership.
home_built_subtitle: Since 2021, we've transformed a former poultry factory into a functioning regenerative village. Here's what's been built.
home_built_trees: 4,000+ trees planted across food forest, jungle hedges, and reforestation zones; 10,000+ planned.
home_built_water: Water retention infrastructure expanded, including swales, ponds, and a 50,000L storage tank.
home_built_mushroom: Mushroom farm constructed and operational, with first harvests supplying the on-site kitchen.
home_built_plans: Approved architectural plans for co-living, hospitality, and production spaces; construction underway.
home_built_biopool: Natural biopool completed and operational, providing year-round swimming and ecosystem services.
home_built_permits: All construction permits secured for 14 co-living suites, restaurant, and production facilities.
home_built_governance: DAO governance structure implemented and operational since 2023, with transparent decision-making processes.
home_built_community: Hosted hundreds of visitors, established core community of 80+ citizens, and completed multiple Citizen Weeks.
home_built_infrastructure: Core infrastructure including roads, utilities, and workspace facilities completed and in use.
home_credibility_legal: Legal entities: Enseada Sonhadora SA, OASA
home_credibility_network: First village in the OASA network
home_token_section_title: Liquid access & governance, powered by blockchain
home_token_section_subtitle: Think of $TDF as a perpetual digital access right â€” simple to buy, easy to hold. It turns guests into co-stewards and gives every holder a say in how the village grows.
home_token_feature_unlock_desc: 1 token = 1 night per year, forever. Access suites, studios, and future villages in the OASA network.
home_token_feature_voice_desc: Vote on development plans, executive team, and community rules. Governance weighted by tokens + presence + contribution.
home_token_feature_longterm_desc: Tokens are locked for 10 years, aligning all holders with the village's long-term success and regenerative mission.
home_token_stat_price_note: Via our web3 powered market maker
home_token_citizenship_desc: Hold 30+ $TDF tokens to qualify for citizenship. Unlock governance participation, priority booking, extended stays, and full access to the regenerative village community.
home_financial_section_subtitle: With infrastructure substantially complete, we're transitioning from capital-intensive development to revenue optimization.
home_build_section_subtitle: With permits secured and forests planted, we're entering the decisive phase. The path is clear: finish the roof, complete the rooms and restaurant, and open the doors.
home_build_item_suites_desc: 20mÂ² rooms with desk, bath, queen bed â€” for nomads, families, and creators
home_build_item_studios_desc: Live/work spaces for longer-term creative residents
home_build_item_restaurant_desc: 60-seat seasonal restaurant with guaranteed internal traffic
home_build_item_wellness_desc: Natural swimming pool complete â€” sauna and yoga space coming
home_authority_swiss_desc: OASA Association registered in Switzerland â€” the only European jurisdiction with legal recognition for DAOs.
home_authority_academic_desc: Featured in University of Melbourne research on digital layers in post-growth communities.
home_authority_transparency_desc: Detailed financial statements, annual reports, and data room available to all prospective investors.
home_authority_quote_1: Digital nomads are creating a technological village in Alentejo â€” Europe's first regenerative village.
home_authority_quote_2: Traditional Dream Factory launches new â‚¬800,000 investment round to expand its ecovillage.
home_authority_reports_intro: Annual reports documenting our journey since 2021
home_invest_section_subtitle: Diversified capital stack designed for resilience and alignment.
home_invest_note: Private loans: 5% annual return over 4 years, backed by our Portuguese SPV. A way to park funds securely while helping grow the commons.
home_webinar_section_title: See the vision. Ask questions. Get the details.
home_webinar_section_desc: Join our monthly call to learn about $TDF tokenomics, loan structures, construction progress, and co-housing planning. Meet the team and your future neighbors.
home_webinar_form_note: First Tuesday of each month â€¢ Calendar invite sent upon registration
home_webinar_success: Webinar invite sent! Please check your inbox.
home_webinar_error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
home_webinar_error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
cohousing_page_title: Co-housing at TDF - Own Your Place in a Regenerative Village
cohousing_page_description: Join Europe's first tokenized regenerative village. Two new neighborhoods: Earthpods in the forest and Townhouses for families. Applications now open.
cohousing_hero_title: Build Your Life in Thriving Nature
cohousing_hero_subtitle: Wake up to birdsong in the food forest. Walk to dinner at the farm-to-table restaurant. Raise your family surrounded by community. Two new neighborhoods are opening in Europe's first tokenized regenerative village.
cohousing_hero_members_note: Join {citizens} citizens and {holders} token holders already building the future
cohousing_form_success: You're on the list! We'll be in touch soon.
cohousing_form_error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
cohousing_form_error_generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
cohousing_neighborhoods_subtitle: Choose the home that fits your life. Both connected to the village heart.
cohousing_earthpods_tagline: For those who want to live light on the land
cohousing_earthpods_description: Compact, beautifully designed homes nestled within our 7-hectare food forest. Wake up to the sounds of nature, step outside to pick your breakfast, and enjoy the privacy of forest living while remaining connected to village life.
cohousing_townhouses_tagline: For those who need room to grow
cohousing_townhouses_description: Spacious family homes with private gardens in the quieter section of the village. Multi-bedroom layouts designed for growing families, with easy access to community amenities and outdoor play areas for children.
cohousing_nature_subtitle: Your home comes with access to a landscape being restored to abundance. Half the land is being rewilded, creating habitat for wildlife and wild spaces for you to explore.
cohousing_nature_rewilded_desc: 50% of village land dedicated to rewilding â€” creating wildlife corridors, native habitats, and wild spaces for residents to explore and connect with nature.
cohousing_nature_foodforest_desc: Parts accessible for self-picking fruits, nuts and herbs. Other areas managed commercially to support the community restaurant and local markets.
cohousing_nature_lakes_desc: 1 built, 4 more planned. Natural swimming, biodiversity hotspots, and peaceful spots for reflection throughout the village landscape.
cohousing_amenities_subtitle: Your home connects you to a complete village ecosystem.
cohousing_amenity_restaurant_desc: Daily meals from our market garden at resident rates
cohousing_amenity_coworking_desc: High-speed Starlink WiFi and focus spaces
cohousing_amenity_governance_desc: Vote on village decisions through DAO participation
cohousing_deal_subtitle: Transparent terms designed for long-term community living. No hidden costs, no speculation â€” just honest participation in a shared vision.
cohousing_cta_subtitle: We're running a co-housing program for the first cohort now. Join the waitlist to be notified when applications open.
home_dataroom_teaser_desc: Access detailed financial statements, development timelines, use of funds, and comprehensive documentation in our data room.
home_gallery_subtitle: See the community, the land, and the work in progress
regen_ag_page_description: Learn about Traditional Dream Factory's regenerative agriculture practices, including agroforestry, water management, and organic farming methods.
regen_ag_hero_subtitle: On 25 hectares of Alentejo farmland, we're transforming degraded pasture into a thriving food system. From mushroom farms and market gardens to commercial orchards and closed-loop composting, we're proving that regenerative agriculture can feed communities while healing the land.
regen_ag_approach_desc_1: At Traditional Dream Factory, we're committed to regenerative agriculture practices that restore soil health, enhance biodiversity, and create resilient ecosystems. Our approach goes beyond sustainable farmingâ€”we actively regenerate the land while producing food and supporting our community.
regen_ag_approach_desc_2: We integrate agroforestry, water retention systems, and organic methods to create a self-sustaining agricultural system that benefits both the land and the people who steward it.
regen_ag_agroforestry_desc: We're planting 10,000+ fruit and nut trees, with 4,000+ already established. Our agroforestry approach combines trees, crops, and livestock in integrated systems that enhance biodiversity and soil health.
regen_ag_water_desc: Our water retention systems include lakes and contour swales that capture and store rainwater, reducing erosion and supporting year-round agricultural production even in Portugal's dry summers.
regen_ag_organic_desc: We use strictly organic methods with biochar production for carbon sequestration. Our practices build soil organic matter, support beneficial microorganisms, and eliminate the need for synthetic inputs.
regen_ag_practice_tree_desc: 10,000+ fruit and nut trees planned, with 4,000+ already planted
regen_ag_practice_water_desc: Lakes and contour swales for rainwater capture and storage
regen_ag_practice_notill_desc: Preserving soil structure and microbial life
regen_ag_practice_cover_desc: Building soil fertility and preventing erosion
regen_ag_practice_compost_desc: Closing nutrient loops through organic waste management
regen_ag_impact_desc: Our regenerative agriculture practices create measurable environmental impact through carbon sequestration, biodiversity enhancement, and soil restoration. We're building a model that can be replicated across Portugal and beyond, demonstrating that agriculture can be a force for ecological restoration.
regen_ag_land_plan_alt: Traditional Dream Factory land plan showing regenerative agriculture zones
regen_ag_mushroom_intro: Our container-based mushroom farm produces gourmet and medicinal varieties, creating a closed-loop system that transforms agricultural waste into high-value products.
regen_ag_mushroom_current_desc: We cultivate several mushroom varieties using low-energy methods like cold water lime pasteurization.
regen_ag_mushroom_extracts_desc: We produce tinctures and extracts from medicinal mushrooms, in partnership with local producers.
regen_ag_mushroom_method: Using UVC sterilization and controlled environment containers for consistent year-round production.
regen_ag_mushroom_distribution_summary: 2026 targets: On-site restaurant, 2-3 local partner restaurants, village shop, and member subscriptions.
regen_ag_orchard_intro: Across 4 orchard zones, we're planting drought-resistant trees for high-value products processed on-site.
regen_ag_orchard_distribution_desc: All products processed on-site for restaurant, shop, and member subscriptions.
regen_ag_orchard_self_sufficiency_note: Plus apple, citrus, pomegranate, and peach for community self-sufficiency.
regen_ag_veggie_intro: Our no-till rotation market garden is designed to feed our community year-round with fresh, organic vegetables.
regen_ag_veggie_method: Our beds are fed with compost from our chicken composters, creating a closed nutrient loop from kitchen scraps to vegetables.
regen_ag_chicken_desc: Our chickens serve a dual purpose: they compost bio-waste and kitchen scraps in chicken composters, while providing the community with fresh eggs daily.
regen_ag_worm_desc: Worm composting is the final step in our humanure system, transforming waste into high-quality compost.
regen_ag_worm_use: The finished vermicompost is used to feed our fruit trees and orchard, completing the nutrient cycle.
regen_ag_biochar_desc: Pyrolysis heater producing biochar while supplying heat to our buildings.
ecology_page_description: Discover the ecological restoration and biodiversity at Traditional Dream Factory - 40+ bird species, 65+ tree species, carbon-validated reforestation, and 1.2M liters of rainwater harvested.
ecology_hero_title: Restoring Ecosystems, One Hectare at a Time
ecology_hero_subtitle: Traditional Dream Factory integrates modern ecological science with traditional stewardship practices to restore ecosystems, sequester carbon, and support biodiversity.
ecology_intro_desc: TDF is not just a demonstration siteâ€”it's a replicable system showing how degraded farmland can be transformed into a thriving ecosystem. We embrace the understanding that humans can be a keystone speciesâ€”not as exploiters, but as active participants in ecosystem restoration.
ecology_intro_quote: Our role is not to develop, to construct, or to divert nature in the name of progressâ€¦ Rather, our role is to build a relationship with our ecosystems, learn what they need to flourish and actively tend them.
ecology_practice_rewilding_desc: A minimum of 50% of all land maintained as wild or rewilded areas. We plant native species and allow natural processes to restore ecosystem integrity.
ecology_practice_water_desc: Capture and store rainfall through swales, ponds, and earthworks. Slow, spread, and sink waterâ€”restoring the hydrological cycle.
ecology_practice_soil_desc: Building soil health through composting, mulching, cover cropping, and minimizing disturbance. Healthy soils act like sponges.
ecology_practice_agroforestry_desc: Diverse crops with at least 5 species per 10mÂ² and 20 per hectare. Syntropic systems with olives, fruits, nitrogen-fixing shrubs, and cover crops.
ecology_practice_fire_desc: Strategic windbreaks with casuarina and poplar trees, fire-retardant prickly pear hedges, moist vegetation zones, and removal of flammable hazards like rockrose and high grasses.
ecology_practice_biodiversity_desc: Active support for native flora and fauna while controlling invasives. Removing eucalyptus saplings to give space for native oaks.
ecology_ofp_desc: TDF achieved affirmed validation through the Open Forest Protocolâ€”a blockchain-based MRV platform bringing transparency and accountability to forest restoration.
ecology_ofp_zone1_species: Strawberry tree, Stone Pine, Cork Oak, Holm Oak, English Oak, European Ash, Retama, Cytisus, Pine
ecology_ofp_zone2_species: Carob, Almonds, Apple, Fig, Mulberry, Elderberries, Pear, Pomegranate, Plum, Peach, Hazelnut, Persimmon, Olive, Walnut, Cork Oak
ecology_birds_desc: A 2025 field survey by volunteer bird observer Gunnar Rise identified over 40 bird species, reflecting rich edge habitats and mosaic land uses. The diversity includes raptors, insectivores, granivores, and nocturnal species.
ecology_edna_desc: In partnership with SimplexDNA, we use cutting-edge eDNA analysis to detect organisms present in water and soil samples. This method identifies species through genetic tracesâ€”from microscopic life to larger animalsâ€”without requiring direct observation.
ecology_edna_quote: Using Environmental DNA (eDNA) analysis we can identify organisms that are present at a given place and time without direct observation... The resulting data makes biodiversity visible. From microbes to mammals.
ecology_water_desc: Given the semi-arid Mediterranean climate, we've implemented extensive water retention infrastructure to enhance drought resilience and groundwater recharge.
ecology_water_lake_desc: Large water body for irrigation and ecosystem support
ecology_water_biopool_desc: Connected to french gutters harvesting ~700mÂ³ rainfall from building roofs
ecology_water_infiltration_desc: Store and infiltrate water from heavy rains into the aquifer
ecology_water_swales_desc: Slow, spread, and sink rainfall into the aquifer
ecology_water_tank_desc: Stores winter runoff for dry season use
ecology_water_impact: Annual water stored for dry season, enhancing drought resilience and groundwater recharge
ecology_water_table_desc: By shifting to rainwater harvesting & increasing infiltration points (ponds, swales). Not exact scienceâ€”but possibly our most important ecological contribution.
ecology_monitoring_desc: We deploy cutting-edge monitoring systems to track ecological progress. Data feeds into open dashboards accessible to all members.
ecology_monitor_edna_desc: Identifying species in soil and water through genetic analysis
ecology_monitor_satellite_desc: Open-source satellite data and drone surveys monitoring vegetation
ecology_monitor_sensors_desc: Soil moisture, temperature, and groundwater monitoring
ecology_monitor_community_desc: Local knowledge combined with scientific rigor
ecology_principles_desc: All OASA projects are bound by constitutional principles ensuring ecological health remains the North Star of all decisions.
ecology_principles_link: Read the full OASA principles at oasa.earth
ecology_principle_wild_desc: Keep at least half of project land as wild or rewilded, planting native species
ecology_principle_water_desc: Capture and store rainfall through earthworks for groundwater recharge
ecology_principle_polyculture_desc: Plant diverse crops with minimum species requirements; integrate food forests
ecology_principle_generations_desc: All decisions evaluated for their impact on seven future generations
ecology_cta_title: Learn More About Our Land Practices
ecology_cta_desc: Explore our regenerative agriculture approach and access detailed impact data in our investor dataroom.
playground_heading: We prototype a regenerative way of life.
playground_intro_1: Born from a crew of burners with dirt under their nails.
playground_intro_2: In 2024 we asked: what if the village were free to access?
playground_intro_3: Bring your gifts; co-create the new paradigm.
playground_intro_4: We aim to be a keystone species for planetary regeneration.
playground_intro_5: Goodbye extraction, hello partnership with Earth.
playground_intro_6: As AI takes the heavy lifting, humans can focus on play and restoration.
landing_about_intro: Co-living plans: 14 suites, 4 loft studios, plus a family house.
landing_join_dreamers_heading: Meet your new home, way of life, and tribe.
landing_join_dreamers_subheading: We're shaping a habitat where nature and innovation thrive.
landing_oasa_heading: TDF is part of the OASA networkâ€”ownership â†’ stewardship.
impact_map_title: Traditional Dream Factory | Regenerative coliving space in Alentejo, Portugal
reg_village_title: How to Build a Regenerative Village â€” book
reg_village_meta_description: An actionable manual for aspiring village builders.
reg_village_img_alt: How to Build a Regenerative Village book
reg_village_heading: How to Build a Regenerative Village
reg_village_intro: "How to Build a Regenerative Village" distills wisdom from 22 practitioners.
dataroom_meta_description: Investment details for Traditional Dream Factory.
dataroom_intro: Seeking catalytic capital through philanthropic grants and low-interest loans (5%, 4+ year payback) to accelerate our proven regenerative co-living ecosystem.
dataroom_investment_highlights_subtitle: Traditional Dream Factory seeks catalytic capital to accelerate our proven regenerative co-living model, offering philanthropic impact with sustainable returns.
dataroom_private_debt_description: Successfully secured private debt financing for infrastructure development
dataroom_token_sales_description: Growing community of 273 committed stakeholders and early adopters
dataroom_land_portfolio_description: Strategic land acquisition in prime Portuguese location
dataroom_buildings_portfolio_description: Option to buy buildings worth â‚¬1M
dataroom_advantage_2: Proven operational model with growing revenue
dataroom_track_record_subtitle: See our complete journey and future plans in our
dataroom_milestone_1_content: 100-guest event venue, 10 luxury glamping tents, 7kW solar array
dataroom_milestone_2_content: 2,000 mixed-species trees planted, 1,000-tree food forest, grey-water treatment wetlands, Open Forest Protocol carbon tracking, Simplex DNA eDNA biodiversity monitoring
dataroom_milestone_3_content: Starlink internet, booking platform, $TDF token launch, DAO governance prototype
dataroom_milestone_4_content: Natural swimming pool (90% complete), rain-harvest storage tank, lake excavation
dataroom_opportunity_1_content: 14 en-suite co-living rooms, farm-to-table restaurant, commercial kitchen
dataroom_opportunity_2_content: Mushroom farm (50% complete), co-housing development, ecosystem credits
dataroom_opportunity_3_content: Zoning process for cohousing, expanded token-holder benefits, bank payment integration
dataroom_opportunity_4_content: "Silo hobbit houses," tree-house concepts, advanced water management
dataroom_documents_subtitle: Access our comprehensive financial and operational reports
dataroom_report_2021_description: Foundation year achievements and initial infrastructure development
dataroom_report_2022_description: Operational co-living launch and environmental infrastructure
dataroom_report_2024_description: Water infrastructure development and fundraising achievements
dataroom_cta_subtitle: Join us in accelerating Portugal's regenerative future through catalytic capital that combines philanthropic impact with sustainable returns.
dataroom_executive_summary_title: Invest in Europe's first DAO-governed regenerative village
dataroom_executive_summary_subtitle: We're raising secured private loans at 5% fixed for 4 years, collateralised by land & buildings in Alentejo. 2026 is a build year; full operations begin in 2027 (14 suites, restaurant, events, agroforestry).
dataroom_executive_key_point_1: Real collateral today ~â‚¬1.0M+ (land + buildings), appreciating with permits and build-out.
dataroom_executive_key_point_2: EU grant target â‚¬660k (55% of â‚¬1.2M co-living + restaurant capex).
dataroom_executive_key_point_3: Bank refinancing (2027â€“2028) to replace private loans post-build.
dataroom_executive_key_point_4: Liquidity support from token sales and co-housing deposits during the build phase.
dataroom_financial_projections_intro: 2025â€“2026 are build years (capex heavy; operating deficits covered by grants/loans/deposits). 2027â€“2029 are operational years with positive EBITDA.
dataroom_financial_projections_note: *Debt Service = "Cost of capital" line (interest + mortgage) from your sheet.
dataroom_use_of_funds_intro: The capital plan combines grants, bank mortgages, secured private loans, token sales, and co-housing deposits to fund land/building acquisition and the build-out of 14 suites and a farm-to-table restaurant, with a ~â‚¬257k buffer.
dataroom_current_balance_note: Existing cash reserves as of October 2025
dataroom_investment_map_subtitle: Breakdown of construction and development costs by category and phase
dataroom_investment_map_architecture_fin: Architecture: Finish execution and site supervision
dataroom_investment_map_mobiliario_senso: Sensors for energy, water consumption & soil monitoring
dataroom_uses_breakdown_title: Uses Breakdown (by % of total uses â‚¬1.88M)
dataroom_debt_repayment_intro: Private loans are secured and carry a 5% fixed coupon over 4 years. Repayment relies on bank refinancing post-build (2027â€“2028), grant coverage of capex, and operational cashflows (from 2027), with collateral providing an additional margin of safety.
dataroom_loan_security_value: First-lien over land & buildings (â‰ˆâ‚¬1.0M+ current value; appreciating with permits & construction)
dataroom_repayment_2027_action: Refinance a portion with bank mortgage
dataroom_repayment_2028_action: Service coupon; partial principal repayment if refinanced
dataroom_exit_base_description: Refinance in 2027â€“28, repay on schedule at 4-year maturity (5% p.a.; ~20% total coupon).
dataroom_exit_upside_description: Faster occupancy & ADR â†’ earlier refi (late 2026â€“27). Potential early principal return.
dataroom_exit_downside_description: Build/permit delays â†’ rely more on collateral/refi; still secured by real assets; repayment may skew toward end of term.
signup_modal_success: Account created successfully! You are now registered for the event.
signup_modal_event_registration_success: You have been successfully registered for the event!
dataroom_building_permits_content: We have obtained building permits to start construction of 14 en-suite co-living rooms, ready for immediate development.
dataroom_zoning_phase_content: Currently in the zoning phase for 23 houses (50-144 m2) for the cohousing development, featuring shared regenerative agriculture, community facilities, and DAO governance.
dataroom_carbon_tracking_title: Carbon Credits via Open Forest Protocol
dataroom_carbon_tracking_content: Tracking reforestation growth through Open Forest Protocol for carbon credits, establishing verifiable environmental impact metrics.
dataroom_biodiversity_monitoring_content: Started monitoring biodiversity via Simplex DNA eDNA technology to establish a strong baseline and position for future biodiversity credits when they become available in Europe.
dataroom_ecological_monitoring_content: Prototype sensor network monitoring water table levels, solar production, water consumption, water flows, and soil health parameters. Currently in development phase with plans for expansion to comprehensive data-driven regenerative management.
dataroom_timeline_subtitle: Two parallel tracks: Co-living in build phase, Co-housing in planning phase.
dataroom_coliving_current_desc: Bio pool, mushroom farm, Hobbit cabins, parking
dataroom_cohousing_pip_desc: PIP (Pedido de InformaÃ§Ã£o PrÃ©via) submitted Sep 2025
dataroom_cohousing_construction_desc: Complete construction plans, start building end 2026/start 2027
dataroom_timeline_phase1_desc: Mushroom farm, pool, Hobbit cabins, reception, bar
dataroom_timeline_phase2_desc: Farm-to-table restaurant and studio accommodation units
dataroom_timeline_phase2_status: Funding required: â‚¬150k â€¢ Start: Q1 2026
dataroom_timeline_phase3_status: Funding required: â‚¬550k for land acquisition upon approval
dataroom_timeline_phase4_status: Funding required: â‚¬950k â€¢ Completion contingent on successful raise
dataroom_funding_required_1_1m: Funding required: â‚¬1.1M - permits secured, pending funds to start
dataroom_investment_highlights_descripti: Traditional Dream Factory offers impact investors a unique opportunity to support regenerative community development while earning competitive returns. Your investment drives environmental restoration, regenerative agriculture, and innovative governance models.
dataroom_use_of_funds_description: Your investment directly funds regenerative community infrastructure: completing 14 co-living suites, establishing a farm-to-table restaurant, and acquiring 25ha of land for regenerative agriculture. Every euro invested creates measurable environmental and social impact.
dataroom_cta_description: Join us in creating Europe's first DAO-governed regenerative village. Your investment delivers both competitive returns and measurable environmental and social impact.
dataroom_cta_tagline: Secured by â‚¬1.0M+ in real estate collateral â€¢ 5% fixed returns â€¢ Measurable environmental impact â€¢ DAO governance innovation
dataroom_impact_benefit_1: Measurable environmental impact through regenerative agriculture and carbon sequestration
dataroom_impact_benefit_2: Scalable model for replicating regenerative communities across Europe
dataroom_impact_benefit_3: Social innovation through DAO governance and community-driven development
dataroom_impact_benefit_4: Financial returns secured by real estate collateral and proven operational model
dataroom_page_title: Invest in Portugal's Flagship Regenerative Village | TDF Data Room
dataroom_page_description: From agroforestry to co-housing, your investment powers TDF 2.0 â€” a commons-based economy rooted in resilience. Explore our impact investment opportunity.
dataroom_hero_title: Invest in Portugal's Flagship Regenerative Village
dataroom_land_acquisition_note: Purchase price â‚¬550k plus 8% transaction fees minus â‚¬30k in rents already paid. Funded by bank and private loans plus deposits
dataroom_development_funds_note: Architect fees, engineer fees, road & lakes
dataroom_building_acquisition_note: Purchase price â‚¬200k (from Sam) plus 8% fees
dataroom_construction_note: Total build cost including 14 co-living suites, restaurant, and finishing works. 55% expected to be covered by TransiÃ§Ã£o Justa grant (â‚¬660k); the remaining â‚¬510k financed by TDF
dataroom_cohousing_deposits_note: Convertible loans, may convert to tokens
dataroom_eu_grant_note: 55% grant on â‚¬1.2M construction budget for co-living suites and restaurant. Requires â‚¬540k co-financing (applied, but not secured)
dataroom_bank_loans_note: Transition existing mortgages: 75% of â‚¬200k building (â‰ˆâ‚¬150k) + 75% of â‚¬550k land (â‰ˆâ‚¬412.5k). Ten-year term at ~4%
dataroom_private_loans_note: Loans at ~5% interest to bridge land acquisition and construction cash flow
dataroom_cohousing_deposits_note: Each participant deposits â‚¬25k+. Goal â‚¬500k. Deposits may convert to equity or stay credits
dataroom_token_sales_note: Sale of 900 $TDF tokens (~â‚¬255 each) to 30 new citizens. Token sale finalized by October 2025
token_sale_lifetime_access_desc_2: Days per year scale with tokens held.
token_sale_tokens_resell_1: Tokens can be resold post Go-Live (see
token_sale_sale_description: Token sales finance village development; each token confers lifelong access rights.
token_sale_accommodation_heading: Transform Tokens into Lifetime Stay Rights
token_sale_accommodation_description: $TDF converts directly into nights of stay at TDF.
token_sale_hero_epic_heading: Gain access to a thriving, regenerative village
token_sale_hero_epic_subheading: 1 $TDF token = 1 night stay, every year, forever (based on accomodation type and availability)
token_sale_token_night_value: 1 $TDF = 1 night per year in standard lodging (utility fee applies).
token_sale_token_access_description: Tokens unlock your preferred room; the utility fee sustains services and operations.
token_sale_booking_approval: Bookings require Space-Host approval; Citizens benefit from instant booking.
token_sale_governance_rights: Each token carries voting rights within the TDF DAO.
token_sale_dive_deeper_description: Explore the technical details and vision behind the $TDF token ecosystem
token_sale_whitepaper_description: Complete technical details of the $TDF token, governance model, and OASA ecosystem
token_total_supply_description: Fixed supply of 18,600 $TDF tokens as per whitepaper. Each token provides lifetime access rights to TDF accommodations.
token_price_history_note: Historical price data will be displayed here once secondary market trading begins.
token_legal_framework_description: All token sales are conducted in compliance with applicable regulations. Review our legal documentation and terms.
token_purchase_step_1_desc: Sign up for a free account to begin your token purchase journey.
token_purchase_step_2_desc: Select the number of tokens you'd like to purchase (minimum 1 token).
token_purchase_step_3_desc: Pay securely using cryptocurrency (cEUR) or bank transfer.
token_purchase_step_4_desc: Your tokens will be delivered to your wallet and you'll gain immediate access rights.
token_secondary_market_description: After the Go-Live phase, $TDF tokens will be tradeable on secondary markets, providing liquidity and flexibility for token holders.
token_secondary_market_note: Secondary market trading will be enabled after the Go-Live milestone. Tokens cannot be transferred or sold until this phase is reached.
token_secondary_market_feature_1: Trade tokens with other community members
dataroom_philanthropic_grants_content: Seeking philanthropic grants to accelerate environmental infrastructure, community development, and regenerative agriculture initiatives with measurable social and environmental impact.
dataroom_low_interest_loans_content: Offering 5% interest loans with 4+ year payback terms for infrastructure development, co-living construction, and sustainable technology implementation.
dataroom_token_utility_content: Support our regenerative ecosystem through $TDF tokens. Token holders gain access to discounted stays, exclusive events, governance rights, and environmental impact as returns.
cafemenu_meta_description: Support the community with every sip.
cafemenu_intro: Drinks in the heart of the villageâ€”donations fuel the mission.
cafemenu_vale_das_eguas_red_wine_bottle: Vale das Eguas â€“ Red wine (bottle)
cafemenu_vale_das_eguas_white_wine_bottl: Vale das Eguas â€“ White wine (bottle)
roadmap_heading: The journey of our regenerative village
roadmap_cta_description: Join us in building a regenerative future. Choose how you want to be part of the Traditional Dream Factory story.
roadmap_2024_bullet_1: Raised â‚¬400 k in private debt
roadmap_2024_bullet_2: Broke ground on the natural swimming pool (now 90 % complete)
roadmap_2024_bullet_3: Excavated the first lake and added a second swale feeding it
roadmap_2024_bullet_4: Installed a 50 mÂ³ rain-harvest storage tank
roadmap_2024_bullet_5: Paid off the bridge loan and transferred land title to the DAO-SPV
roadmap_2025_bullet_1: Upgraded floors, windows & doors for event space, cowork, restaurant shell
roadmap_2025_bullet_2: Added French drains to capture all roof runoff
roadmap_2025_bullet_3: Renovated the team house (new roof, full interior refit)
roadmap_2025_bullet_4: Grew token-holder community to 280 members; enabled bank payments for tokens
roadmap_2025_bullet_5: Developed our masterplan - and started zoning process for cohousing
roadmap_2025_bullet_6: Advanced the mushroom farm to 50 % completion
roadmap_2025_bullet_7: Began construction of "silo hobbit houses"; tree-house concept approved
roadmap_2025_bullet_8: Natural pool edging and filtration finish-out scheduled for Q4
roadmap_2026_bullet_2: Install a commercial kitchen and finish the farm-to-table restaurant
roadmap_2026_bullet_3: Finalise co-housing construction drawings and permitting

citizenship_page_meta_description: Citizenship at Traditional Dream Factory: belonging, governance, and access through tokens.
citizenship_hero_subtitle: Join 300 founding citizens coâ€‘creating the first blockchain powered regenerative village. Citizenship blends commonsâ€‘based access, tokenized governance, and handsâ€‘on land stewardship.
citizenship_whats_here_today_1: 5 hectares under regeneration: agroforestry, orchards, rewilding.
citizenship_whats_here_today_3: Gardens, chickens, and food systems feeding community life.
citizenship_whats_here_today_4: Glamping tents, co-working, industrial kitchen and more.
citizenship_whats_here_today_5: Tokenâ€‘powered governance with real citizen participation.
citizenship_roadmap_2: Expand food forests & water systems for longâ€‘term abundance.
citizenship_roadmap_4: Consolidate assets, secure EU coâ€‘financing & bank support.
citizenship_benefits_belonging_desc: Perpetual entry to TDF spaces, membership NFT as proof of citizenship, access to TDF Members page, exclusive Telegram group, and citizen-only programs.
citizenship_benefits_governance_desc: Submit forum proposals, vote on decisions, participate in community calls, and co-create via tokenized, transparent governance systems.
citizenship_benefits_booking_desc: Book up to 1 year in advance, extended stays up to 180 days, shorter minimum stay requirements, and instant booking capabilities.
citizenship_benefits_priority_desc: Priority access to events in both participant and creator modes, early co-housing opportunities, and exclusive citizen gatherings.
citizenship_benefits_financial_desc: Access to financed token plans with flexible payment options, earn stay credits for volunteering work, and reduced fees for citizen activities.
citizenship_benefits_impact_desc: Bring projects forward, earn recognition via Proof of Presence & Sweat systems, directly regenerate land and community, and shape the future of TDF.
citizenship_pathway_subtitle: A simple journey from first contact to full participation. Details live in the Game Guide.
citizenship_pathway_onboarding_desc: Learn TDF culture, governance and shared agreements.
citizenship_pathway_presence_desc: Establish your Proof of Presence and meet the community.
citizenship_pathway_tokens_desc: Buy outright or choose a financed plan (utility unlocked instantly).
citizenship_pathway_vouching_desc: Fellow members vouch for your alignment and care.
citizenship_pathway_governance_desc: Participate in monthly calls and annual gathering.
citizenship_financed_tokens_1: Available for citizenship (30, 60, 90, 120 token plans over 36 months).
citizenship_financed_tokens_3: Instant utility unlocked from all tokens.
citizenship_for_3_years: for 3 years â€¢ based on current bonding curve
citizenship_responsibilities_summary: Summarized from the Game Guide: Citizenship.
citizenship_responsibilities_1: Attend â‰¥1 community call per quarter; join the annual Citizen Gathering.
citizenship_responsibilities_2: Presence guideline: visit 2+ weeks per year; keep Proof of Presence active.
citizenship_responsibilities_3: Live the culture: care for land, people, and projects; uphold agreements.
citizenship_cta_heading: Ready to claim your place as a founding citizen?
citizenship_cta_subtitle: Step into agency, belonging, and impact. Help us complete the village and grow the commons.
citizenship_faq_tokens_needed_q: How many tokens do I need for citizenship?
citizenship_faq_tokens_needed_a: Citizenship is unlocked at 30+ $TDF held. Financed options let you build towards this over time with instant utility unlocked from day one.
citizenship_faq_portugal_q: Do I have to live in Portugal?
citizenship_faq_portugal_a: No. Many citizens spend seasons at TDF and contribute remotely between visits. Minimum presence guideline is 2+ weeks per year to stay in sync with the culture.
citizenship_faq_land_stewardship_q: What if I'm new to land stewardship?
citizenship_faq_land_stewardship_a: Great. We have cultural onboarding, hands-on workdays, and an education program so you can learn by doing.
citizenship_faq_resell_a: $TDF tokens are locked until Go-Live event. See the token page for mechanics, bonding curve, and current pricing.
citizenship_faq_responsibilities_q: Where can I read the full responsibilities/rights?
citizenship_faq_responsibilities_a: See the Game Guide (Citizenship) for detailed roles, expectations, rituals, and governance processes.

report_download_modal_subscription_messa: Subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated with our progress and get instant access to the {year} report.
press_page_description: Media coverage and press mentions of Traditional Dream Factory, Europe's first regenerative village DAO.
press_page_intro: Europe's first regenerative village DAO has been featured in 80+ publications across Portugal, Spain, France, UK, and international Web3 media.

press_august_forbes: Portugal Ã© o sÃ©timo destino favorito dos nÃ³madas digitais
press_september_efe: Op-Ed: Regenerar para avanzar - el futuro del campo
press_recent_idealista: Primeira aldeia regenerativa tokenizada da Europa nasce no Alentejo
press_podcasts_subtitle: Founder Samuel Delesque on regenerative finance and village building.
press_reuters_summary: Examines the "slomad" trend of eco-conscious digital nomads post-pandemic. Features TDF as a prime example of co-living spaces putting green ideas into practice, describing it as "a co-living space in Portugal's vast rural Alentejo region."
press_tyn_summary: Reports TDF becoming "the first eco-village funded through its own token" and "the first regenerative community in Europe to use this tool to finance, manage, and inhabit an ecological restoration project." Notes 280 token holders and 6,300+ tokens in circulation.
press_portugal_news_summary: Features TDF within coverage of Portugal's digital nomad appeal, describing the project as "pioneering regenerative project in Europe, located in Abela, in the municipality of Santiago do CacÃ©m, Alentejo."
press_ofp_summary: Technical deep-dive into OASA's partnership with Open Forest Protocol for forest monitoring and verification. Notes the project covers 25 hectares with OFP deploying on initial 0.7 hectares for reforestation with native species.
press_jornal_economico_summary: Details Phase 2 expansion plans including 14 private suites, 23 wooden houses, 4 artist studios, restaurant, and biological pool. Reports over â‚¬1 million raised to date with 60+ active community members.
press_jornal_economico_milestone: Reports TDF exceeding â‚¬1.2 million in cumulative financing. Token value at approximately â‚¬256, with 280 holders and 6,300+ tokens circulating. Details approved urban plan for 2027.
press_diario_summary: Comprehensive feature on TDF as Europe's first regenerative village using blockchain. Details financing structure: â‚¬400k from token sales (â‚¬242 per token), â‚¬200k for land acquisition, â‚¬400k in loans. Notes 2,000+ trees planted and 1.2 million liter water reservoir.
press_alentejo_summary: The most comprehensive Portuguese feature. Describes TDF's land trust model and team of 60+ digital nomads from Germany, Switzerland, and France. Covers local integration, notes 4,000+ trees planted, and plans for 300 permanent residents by 2026.
press_digital_inside_summary: Tech-focused coverage emphasizing Web3/blockchain. Notes 90+ hectares, â‚¬1 million invested, 250+ active token holders.
press_podcast_green_planet: Topics: OASA conservation Web3 non-profit; TDF coliving & co-creation space; re:build regenerative village builders network; Closer platform for regenerative communities.
press_podcast_refi: Topics: Money's shift from degenerative to regenerative finance; from ownership to stewardship; balancing Web3 and nature; "The Story of Separation" philosophy; ReFi Week at TDF.
press_podcast_crypto_altruism: Topics: DAOs as experiments for local democracies; Web3 for ensuring land ownership returns to community; vision for 2050 "Sacred Economy" and planetary restoration.
press_podcast_blockchain_socialist: Topics: TDF's vision as a DAO; ReFi Week experience; blending crypto with permaculture; community land trusts.
press_podcast_strangers: Topics: Decentralized ownership model; decision-making methods; positive impact measurement; TDF selected as 1 of 12 cutting-edge regenerative villages by Regen Civics cohort.
press_podcast_primal: Topics: The hippie movement's pioneering role in regenerative villages; why many communities fail due to economic instability; how finance and crypto may unlock decentralized power.
press_contact_description: For media inquiries, interview requests, or press materials, please contact:
team_page_description: Meet the team building Europe's first regenerative village
team_hero_subtitle: A decentralized collective of builders, dreamers, and land stewards creating a tokenized regenerative village.
team_oasa_association_desc: Swiss non-profit overseeing land conservation and governance across the network
team_tdf_dao_desc: Community governance through token holders, citizens, and the citizen assembly
team_executive_team_desc: Day-to-day operations, development, and strategic direction
team_leadership_desc: Strategic real estate development and operational direction given by the DAO.
team_samuel_desc: Franco-Danish entrepreneur and former software engineer. Founded TDF with a vision of moving "from ownership to stewardship."
team_peter_desc: Day-to-day financial operations, budgeting, and treasury management for TDF.
team_ground_teams_desc: The people making magic happen every day at TDF.
team_hospitality_team_desc: Run a profitable rural tourism operation with high guest satisfaction.
team_ecology_food_desc: Produce food for 50+ people, increase soil fertility, and retain water (OASA metrics).
team_build_team_desc: Create unique accommodations and beautify the land for human use.
team_mushroom_farm_desc: Produce edible mushrooms for 3 restaurants and medicinal products.
team_partners_desc: Professional partners and service providers supporting TDF and OASA.
team_dao_desc: Decentralized governance through our token holder community.
team_citizens_desc: Members who have completed the onboarding process and embody TDF values.
team_citizen_assembly_desc: Regular gatherings to discuss proposals and shape the community direction.
team_treasury_desc: Community-controlled funds for development and operations.
team_token_holders_desc: 280+ holders with governance rights and accommodation access.
team_sweat_holders_desc: Contributors rewarded with tokens for work on the project.
team_presence_holders_desc: Proof of presence tokens earned through time spent at TDF.
team_oasa_association_overview: The non-profit umbrella organization protecting land in perpetuity.
team_oasa_mission_desc: Acquire & conserve 100k hectares worldwide, monitoring and increasing soil quality, water cycles, and biodiversity through regenerative practices.
team_oasa_assembly_desc: All OASA members with voting rights
team_join_desc: We're always looking for passionate people to join our regenerative community. Whether as a steward, volunteer, or contributor.
dataroom_hero_description: From agroforestry to co-housing and high-end hospitality, your investment powers Europe's first DAO-governed regenerative village. We're raising secured private loans at 5% fixed for 4 years.
